ABOUT.TITLE: About Transcom Automobile
ABOUT.STORY_TEXT: Founded in 2024, Transcom Automobile has been providing premium car rental services to our valued customers. We pride ourselves on our exceptional fleet of vehicles and outstanding customer service.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: To provide our customers with the finest luxury vehicles and an unmatched rental experience, ensuring comfort, safety, and satisfaction in every journey.

DURATION.QUESTION: What is the rental duration?
DURATION.ANSWER: Minimum rental period is 24 hours. Long-term rentals are available with special rates.

LATE_RETURN.QUESTION: What happens if I return the car late?
LATE_RETURN.ANSWER: Late returns are charged at an hourly rate. If you know you'll be late, please contact us to extend your rental.

AIRPORT.QUESTION: Do you offer airport pickup/drop-off?
AIRPORT.ANSWER: Yes, we offer complimentary airport pickup and drop-off services for all rentals.

PRICE.QUESTION: What is included in the rental price?
PRICE.ANSWER: Basic insurance, 24/7 roadside assistance, and standard mileage allowance are included. Fuel is not included.

MODIFICATION.QUESTION: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
MODIFICATION.ANSWER: Yes, reservations can be modified or cancelled up to 24 hours before the pickup time without penalty.
